1.text: Retrieve/update local Solidity repositories data from Github

3.text: Clone all truffled testable Solidity repositories

8.text: Migrate truffled compiled with test directory

50.text: Test truffled compiled with test directory

80.text: Install solidity-coverage on Successfull Tests Projects

81.text: Execute Sonar Scanner for successfull tests (create sonar-project.properties)
